FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, variable 2 to 4 at first in southeast, otherwise southerly veering westerly later in northwest, 4 to 6. In north, southeasterly 4 to 6, veering southerly 5 to 7, perhaps gale 8 later, then veering westerly 4 to 6 later in west.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate, occasionally rough in northwest. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, fog patches in southeast, occasional rain in west . In north, occasional rain.
Visibility
In south, moderate or good, occasionally very poor in southeast. In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
